metadata.name: Kingdom/Order
metadata.description: Kindgom/Order wordlessly follows a man as he searches for some sort of meaning in his life. Through symbols and sounds it is clear that he is a part of the greater Natural world, and a bit divorced from the Modern world which surrounds him. The nameless protagonist finds himself noticing and following the sounds of the animals around him. But, how much of it is real, and how much of it is in his head?
